channel.title: I++; every second no more, no less
channel.description: i want to make a varible[gameTimeOnline] that tells you how long you been online but i need my varible to add +1 seconds to the value of gameTimeOnline every second [repeating]. How? -- i'll make a method when called adds +1 to "gameTimeOnline" and displays the value. but im asking where can i call the method every second?

item.title: I++; every second no more, no less

item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Trigger*, post:4, topic:247624”]gameTimeOnline++;
process() method.[/quote]
That would do it every 500ms.

Update it every 5 seconds, but update every players online time, not just one.

Timer timer = new Timer(); // do what you need to do to the timer. timer.scheduleAtFixedRate(new TimerTask() { public final void run() { for(Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { p.updateTime(); } } });
